block.p: Recent Sale $5.75 million 13-15 Bay Ridge Avenue (at Owls Head Court) Brooklyn A Brooklyn investment firm has bought a two-story corner building in Bay Ridge, leased by MetLife through 2011, and plans to build another floor for the tenant. Buyer: Philips International Seller: Andy Nathan Brokers: Brian Leary and Stephen Palmese, Massey Knakal Realty

Recent Lease $33/sq. ft. approximate annual rent $189,950 75 Broad Street Manhattan A designer and developer of geographic information technology has expanded into 5,756 square feet on the fourth floor in this 33-story financial district building. Tenant: ESRI Landlord: JEMB Realty Brokers: Mike McKenna and Frank Cento, Cushman & Wakefield

For Lease $45/sq. ft. The Colorado 201 East 86th Street (at Third Avenue) Manhattan A lease is available on the ground floor and three floors below for as many as 27,135 square feet or as few as 4,000 square feet in this 36-story residential building. Owner: The Related Companies Brokers: Chris Mongeluzo, Eric Zemachson and Jason Vacker, Newmark Knight Frank
